Welcome to Plissken's Pit (Mini 1199) (Also, thanks for joining my first moderated game on MS)

11. bristep123
12. Empking
13. Sky

(Bold denotes confirmed by PM into the game)

Replacements:
1. Haylen
2. Locke Lamora

Ruleset (Stolen from THadmiral and adapted):

1. This is a game. Have fun. Don't let things get personal.

2. During Day, you may vote for the player you want to lynch. Votes should be in the form VOTE: Player (or bolded) or they may not be counted. It is helpful to "Unvote" when switching your vote to a different player. Votes, will only be counted once you have Unvoted.

3. Whenever a player has a majority in votes, that player will be lynched, his or her role will be revealed, and Night will begin. Once a player has reached a majority, Twilight will begin. No votes or unvotes will be registered, although talking may continue until the thread is locked. You may also Vote: No Lynch; a majority will end Day without a death.

4. If discussion lags or Day goes on for too long, a deadline may be set. If no one has reached a majority at the deadline, the person with the most votes will be lynched.

5. During Night, players with role abilities may send targets for those abilities. Choices are due by the posted deadline, but day may start earlier if the choices are sent in early.

6. Don't edit/delete posts. Use the "Preview" button to look over your post before you submit it.

7. Don't quote any PMs from the Moderator.

8. Mafia, werewolves, masons etc. are allowed to communicate by QT at all times (i.e. not just during the night phase). Otherwise, do not talk to anyone about this game outside the thread.

9. When you are killed you may make one final post (as long as it is simply an "oh well" type post that doesn't reveal any game information), but then you are dead. Do not talk until the game is over; this includes talking to living players outside the thread.

10. I will send out prods at my discretion/on request. Players may be replaced if a prod is not responded to.

11. No attempting to break the game with cryptography or invisible text etc.

12. If you have any question, complaint, or comment, PM the Moderator.

13. I reserve the right to add or modify a rule as I see fit

14. Finally my colour is Blue. Do not use it.

I will endeavour to get votecounts in as frequently as required. Also, please bear in mind this game is being run on UK time (GMT +1)

It was a normal town, much like any other. Townsfolk were nice to each other, nothing bad ever happens here, well that was a few days ago when the body of Max the Janitor was discovered down the alley behind the local tavern...

Now people are suspicious and they are trying to root out the bad elements that seem to have crept into the town. In a town like this, the law of the noose is applied....

PM's are now going out. Game will start when 11/13 players have confirmed in thread! Good luck!

Sample VT PM
You are a vanilla townie, Town aligned, and you've got no special powers at Night. No investigations, no protection, no gun to shoot people. Your only powers are the ability to post, vote, and think.

You win when all the scum are eliminated (even if you are dead by that time), so try to lynch well!

The game starts now.

Essentially I had to try to gain as much info from my scum buddy as possible, we were told an IC existed as it was an open game or semi open, i forget. My aims were to obviously do the usual scum thing whilst trying to find the town IC member - if i hit the oppisite sides scum IC it would have been bad the info the town ic would give out would suck for my team. This was a really great role because i felt like i was in a fairly unique situation the other IC scum was the other teams godfather (which i had some suspicion of thanks to my scum buddy) and so i was the only one who could safely make a night kill on the town ic.
Other than that, I tend to like the VT role, on the site i play i always end up eating a night kill and so it's about the best role i can be there to be pro-town I've not yet had a third party role, which i believe i'd also love to play.
